title: Newspipe 8.0 –  a web news aggregator – Now with management of bookmarks
author: cedricbonhomme
content: readme.rst newspipe presentationnewspipe is web-based newsaggregator reader.main features be easily deployed heroku on traditional server;multiple users use newspipe instance; restful api manage articles ( connect own crawler);data liberation: export import your account a json file;export import feeds opml files;favorite articles;detection inactive feeds;share articles google +, pinboard reddit;personal management bookmarks ( import pinboard). core technologies are flask,asyncio ,sqlalchemy react.python >= 3.5 is required.documentation documentation is available here provides different ways install newspipe.test newspipe heroku: is important specify application name the url your instance(platform_url) through heroku form.licensenewspipe is under gnu affero general public license version 3.contactcédric bonhomme
